subject: Load cell not working
description_text:
Hello,

I've tried setting up my load cell but it's not working. Everything is
plugged in, the throttle works fine but I get no response from the load cell

conversations.body_text:

On Wed, Nov 19, 2025, 11:26 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Peter bautista,  Please connect all pedals properly and then reconnect the USB. Next, click the Offset function in the software to reset the pedals’ zero (white signal), and then recalibrate them.
